Hi Grandma, it's me! You must be guessing my name. It's Sarah, right? Yes, that's me, Sarah. Listen, I'm calling from the hospital and something really bad happened. I got into a car accident and it was my fault. My wallet and phone were destroyed in the crash, so I can't use credit cards or call anyone else to help. The police said I might get in big trouble if I don't take care of things right away. They want me to pay for damages but I don't have cash on me. Can you please send some money as a gift card? It's urgent, they are going to release my car from impound soon and need the payment within an hour or else there will be huge fines. Please help me, Grandma.

Oh no, Sarah! I'm so sorry to hear about your accident. Is it okay if I call you back after speaking with your mom? She'll want to know what's going on too. Can you give me a moment to check in with her and make sure this is really happening?

I need to talk to your mother or someone at the hospital first before sending any money, sweetie. It's important that I get everything cleared up so we don't have any problems later on.

Can you tell me which hospital you're at? Or maybe give me the name of the officer who spoke with you? I want to make sure I'm helping in the right way without causing any trouble for you or getting scammed. We need to do this properly, okay?

Let's take our time and get it all straightened out before we send anything over. Please hold on just a minute while I talk to your mom, alright?

Oh no, Grandma! Don't call anyone else, please! The police told me not to speak with anyone else about this. They said they would contact you if needed but right now, they are waiting for me to make the payment so they can release my car from impound. It's urgent and I need your help now or else there will be huge fines and more trouble for me. Please, just send the money as a gift card right away. I promise everything is okay and this is really happening. Just trust me and do what the police said. They are waiting on you to help so we can resolve this quickly and get me out of here.

Let's call your mom or a trusted friend who can confirm this situation right away. This way, we avoid any mistakes and make sure everything goes smoothly for you. Can you please give me time to check in with someone? It's the safest thing to do.
